about_the_game:
One of set of each SP version card.

[INCLUDED]
- D-BT05/SP01 Dragonic Overlord the End
- D-BT05/SP02 Burning Horn Dragon
- D-BT05/SP03 Phantom Blaster Overlord
- D-BT05/SP04 Majesty Lord Blaster
- D-BT05/SP05 Blaster Blade
- D-BT05/SP06 Skull Witch, Nemain
- D-BT05/SP07 Deepening Night, Tamayura
- D-BT05/SP08 Approaching Fangs, Kheios
- D-BT05/SP09 Fountain of Knowledge, Eva
- D-BT05/SP10 One Who Walks the Path of Light, Thegrea
- D-BT05/SP11 One Who Blooms in the Dark, Thegrea
- D-BT05/SP12 For One's Precious Thing, Rorowa
- D-BT05/SP13 Dragritter Girl of Flame Blossoms, Radylina
- D-BT05/SP14 Twin Direful Dolls, Ririmi
- D-BT05/SP15 Twin Direful Dolls, Rarami
- D-BT05/SP16 Cool-headed Executor, Mikani
- D-BT05/SP17 Knight of Blackness, Obscudeid
- D-BT05/SP18 Atrocious? Moth Girl, Maple
- D-BT05/SP19 Stealth Fiend, Amaviera
- D-BT05/SP20 Incorruptible Holy Light, Eufha
- D-BT05/SP21 Lady Healer of the Creaking World
- D-BT05/SP22 Invigorate Sage
- D-BT05/SP23 Zypsophila Fairy, Asher
- D-BT05/SP24 Festival of Burning, Tamayura
- D-BT05/SP25:In the Calm Sunlight, Tamayura
- D-BT05/SP26 Nine-tailed Fox Spirit, Tamayura
- D-BT05/SP27 Fleeting Shine That Lights Life
- D-BT05/SP28 Quagmire of Solace, Kheios
- D-BT05/SP29 In the Calm Streets, Kheios
- D-BT05/SP30 One With Profound Mercy, Kheios
- D-BT05/SP31 Smooth Research Progress, Eva
- D-BT05/SP32 An Afternoon Nap Regardless of Place, Eva
- D-BT05/SP33 One Who Craves Knowledge, Eva
- D-BT05/SP34 Experiment Successful!
- D-BT05/SP35 Harsh Training, Thegrea
- D-BT05/SP36 Beneath the Brilliant Light, Thegrea
- D-BT05/SP37 Knight of Integrity, Thegrea
- D-BT05/SP38 Knight of Loyalty, Bedivere
- D-BT05/SP39 Knight of Friendship, Kay
- D-BT05/SP40 Little Sage, Marron
- D-BT05/SP41 Wingal Brave
- D-BT05/SP42 Bravery To Stand Against, Will to Pierce Through
- D-BT05/SP43 The World 3000 Years Later, Rorowa
- D-BT05/SP44 Awakening from Slumber, Rorowa
- D-BT05/SP45 Bioroid Youth, Rorowa

**If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive a worthy amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.
**This set is also included in the "Rare Card Set 01 - 09".
**It is possible to purchase both individual Rare Card Sets and the bundle, but the acquisition of SP cards will only be reflected once.
**Please be careful not to purchases a Rare Card Sets twice.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: One of set of each SP version card.
